II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 1584
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
1583 - B 80881 — 300 (2014/10)
D 1 -
    msgqj

msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —

i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g
wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk
whg m%udKj;a ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka
wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk
úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2014 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 31 jeks Èk
m< lrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2014 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 17 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh
hq;= h'
 2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&'
2014 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq' —  2014'10'03 Èk m< jQ wxl 1"883 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  I : III  iy III fldgia m< fkdùh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2014'10'101584
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
osid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - ud;f,a
l,a bl=;aj we;s kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
ud;f,a ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj" wjika lrk ,o j¾I mylg ^05& jvd merKs my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2014'12'16
jeks Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
02' fuu kvqj,g wod, hï md¾Yjlrejl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda
kvqjg f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2014'12'16 Èkg m%:ufhka fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj;
bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqkfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2014'12'16 Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha mq¿iaid
úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
úrdÊ rK;=x."

AR 678/08
osid ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - j,mfka
1894 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{dmkf;a 05 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokhhs
02' fuu wêlrKh bÈßfha wjika ù we;s jir mylg ^05& jvd merKs my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d 1894 wxl 12 ork
fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍï wd{dmkf;a 05 jeks j.ka;sfha úêúOdk m%ldrj fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03&
bl=;aùfuka miqj úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
03' Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj, msgm;a fyda fjk;a Bg wod< f,aLk ,nd.ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;ka úiska
fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr ta i|yd b,a¨ï l<hq;= njg o" lsishï kvq jd¾;djla úkdY fkdl<
hq;= njg Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;af;l= isà kï fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr ;ud úiska u fyda
kS;s{jrfhl= u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska idOdrK fya;= bÈßm;a lsÍug l%shd l<hq;= njg o fuhska ksfõokh
lrkq ,efí'
04' ;j o" Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj,g wod<j lsishï ;ekam;= uqo,la fõ kï" tu uqo,a 2014 foieïn¾ 31 jeks Èkg fmr
wdmiq ,nd .ekSug lghq;= l< hq;= h' tfia fkdjqjfyd;a oekgu;a tu ;ekam;= kvqj wjika ù jir follg jvd jeä neúka uqo,a
fr.=,dis 570 mßÈ l,a bl=;a jQ ;ekam;= f,i i<ld tu ;ekam;a uqo,a uq' fr' 571^2& mßÈ wdodhug ner lsÍug l%shd lrk nj fuhska
ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
tï' tÉ' *Ílaãka"
Èid úksiqre yd ufyia;%d;a"
Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh- j,mfka'
2014 iema;eïn¾ ui 22 jeks Èk"
j,mfka Èid ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha § h'
